The OHDSI Vocabularies database is required to display concept mappings and terminology details. Please configure the vocabularies folder in settings.

All concepts identified as potentially related to this general concept.
These include descendants and related concepts from OMOP hierarchies.

• Recommended: Manually validated by INDICATE experts as strongly associated
• Not recommended: Related but not the primary match (see comments for rationale)
Detailed information about the selected concept from Associated Concepts including vocabulary codes links to ATHENA and FHIR resources
Expert guidance and comments for ETL (Extract Transform Load) processes related to this concept
All related concepts and hierarchical relationships from OHDSI vocabularies including both standard and non-standard concepts. Double-click a row to see details.

Select a mapping to view details
